message.original: ああ、覚者さま―― どうか今一度私を――
message.translation: Ah, Arisen. I am at your side.

message.original: 我らはいつも、覚者さまとともに
message.translation: We are always at the arisen side.

message.original: 覚者さま、お力添えの機会 お待ちしています
message.translation: Arisen, we look forward for an oppotunity to help.

message.original: 覚者さま、どうぞ私にも同伴の許可を リムストーンからのお声掛けを お待ちしています
message.translation: Arisen, your permission to accompany you please as your we heed your calling on the rift.

message.original: 冒険の手助けなら、いつでもいたします
message.translation: If you are going to an adventure, we will help anytime.

message.original: まだ、作業を承っておりません
message.translation: Yet, we did not receive any work.

message.original: ご指示をお待ちしています
message.translation: We look forward to your guidance

message.original: 旅かクラフトのご用命あらば いつでも動きます
message.translation: If you are ordering for a journey or crafting. We will move at any time.

message.original: 只今作業中ですので、お待ちください
message.translation: Since it is now on work, please wait.

message.original: 完成まで、いましばらくかかります
message.translation: To be completed. it takes a while.

message.original: 集中力を要しますので、会話はまた後ほど
message.translation: Since it takes concentration to finish, I cannot talk right now.

message.original: 救っていただき、ありがとうございます 次こそは必ずお役に――！
message.translatION: You saved me, thank you very much dear arisen!

message.original: 申し訳ありません、覚者さま 精進いたします
message.translation: Truly sorry arisen but we are vegetarians.

message.original: 次こそご期待を―― この経験を生かします
message.translation: Following your expectations, we will take advantage of this experience.
